panels.description:
Upstream zuul *gate* queue.  The time a given patch will wait before running the upstream gate.

Click on the links below to go to the zuul build status.
panels.title: Upstream Zuul queue

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream *gate* jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "passed" = 'False' AND "voting" = 'True' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'RETRY' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'CANCELED' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream gate jobs

panels.description:
A running list of failing upstream *gate* jobs. By default this will show the last 3 days.

Click on individual jobs to go to the logs or to the gerrit change.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "cloud", "region", "result", "voting", "sova_reason" as "Failure Cause"  FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "pipeline" = 'gate' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND  "result" != 'RETRY'  AND  "result" != 'CANCELED' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream failing gate jobs

panels.description:
Gives the time a patch waits before it can run in the *RDO gate*. 

Click on the links below to go to the softwarefactory-project.io rdoproject.org zuul builds status.
panels.title: RDO Zuul queue

panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'CANCELED' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "result" != 'CANCELED' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' AND "result" != 'CANCELED' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream CI stats

panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "pipeline"='periodic'  AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "pipeline"='periodic' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "pipeline"='periodic' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream Periodic CI stats

panels.description: Percentage of RDO  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: RDO CI stats

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream *gate* jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "passed" = 'False' AND "result" = 'RETRY') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream jobs failed in RETRY

panels.description: This is a place to keep some notes and links to current etherpads for ruck rovers.
panels.title: Useful Links

panels.description: A running list of failing upstream that hit RETRY's

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "cloud", "region", "result", "sova_reason" as "Failure Cause"  FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False'  AND "result" = 'RETRY') AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "job_name" =~ /tripleo-ci.*-centos-8-ovb.*/ AND "branch" = 'stable/ussuri' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' AND "job_name" =~ /tripleo-ci.*-centos-8-ovb.*/ AND "branch" = 'stable/ussuri' AND "result" != 'ABORTED') AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Running list of *upstream* periodic jobs

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num", "sova_reason" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'periodic') AND $timeFilter

panels.description:
Running list of all upstream jobs including *check* and *gate* queues.

Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num", "pipeline", "voting" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /.*molecule-.*/ OR "job_name" =~ /.tox.*/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "project"

CIX: [cix google sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1M1U-ekjEsec-bRjRq7q5rzjbJWKE2uT-ESX4SkeC0Uc/edit#gid=0&fvid=1778061576)

Alert bugs [alert bugs](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16rqgaSSoQrYNjsI4q0YInJxrOOJL3xyP3t3D6ZpluFY/)

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'check') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'check') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'master'
group by Testname, Branch;

SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'train'
group by Testname, Branch;

SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'stein'
group by Testname, Branch;

SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'rocky'
group by Testname, Branch;

SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'queens'
group by Testname, Branch;
